company.name: Smith & Associates Legal
company.practice_areas: Personal Injury, Family Law, Criminal Defense

problem.headline: Missing Consultations Due to Slow Follow-Up and Limited Availability
problem.description: Smith & Associates was spending significant money on advertising but converting poorly. The problem was not the ads - it was the response time. Potential clients calling after hours, during court appearances, or during consultations were going to voicemail.
pain_points: Missing 45% of inbound calls during business hours due to attorneys in court or consultations
After-hours calls (often urgent legal matters) going completely unanswered
Lead response time averaging 4 hours when competitors responded in minutes
Expensive PPC ads generating leads that were never converted
Intake staff overwhelmed with qualification calls that went nowhere

key_stat.context: While competitors responded in under 10 minutes

solution.headline: 24/7 AI Intake with Smart Qualification and Instant Scheduling
solution.description: Capture Client deployed AI voice agents trained specifically on legal intake processes. The AI was configured to handle initial consultations, qualify leads by case type and urgency, and book appointments directly with appropriate attorneys.

implementation_steps.title: Practice Area Training
implementation_steps.description: Trained the AI on each practice area: personal injury, family law, and criminal defense. The AI learned what questions to ask and how to route cases.

implementation_steps.title: Qualification Logic
implementation_steps.description: Built qualification flows to identify case merit, statute of limitations concerns, and potential case value. Hot leads get immediate attorney notification.

implementation_steps.title: Calendar Integration
implementation_steps.description: Connected to each attorney's calendar with rules about case types they handle and available consultation times.

implementation_steps.title: Compliance Setup
implementation_steps.description: Ensured all scripts and processes met bar association guidelines for non-attorney staff interactions.

key_features: Smart case routing based on type, urgency, and attorney availability
Statute of limitations awareness and urgency flagging
Instant booking of consultations based on attorney calendars
Complete intake documentation with call transcripts
Hot lead alerts for high-value or urgent cases

metrics.context: Leads captured between 6 PM and 8 AM

roi.calculation: Additional cases signed x average case value, minus AI cost

testimonial.quote: In personal injury, the first lawyer to call back often wins the case. We were losing cases worth $50,000+ because we could not answer fast enough. Now our AI responds in seconds, qualifies the case, and books the consultation before I even know about the lead. We signed 8 additional cases last month just from after-hours intake. That is over $200,000 in potential fees.
testimonial.author: Jennifer Smith
testimonial.title: Managing Partner

milestones.milestone: Practice area training and compliance review
